title: UCI Datasets for structure estimation tasks
Author_references: S. de Vito and E. Massera and M. Piga and L. Martinotto and G. di Francia
One_sentence_description: Two preprocessed datasets collected from the UCI repository for structure learning from multivariate data.

title: Pharmacological dataset on drug-induced TdP risk assessment
Author_references: Llopis-Lorente, J., Gomis-Tena, J., Cano, J., Romero, L., Saiz, J., & Trenor, B. (2020). In silico classifiers for the assessment of drug proarrhythmicity. Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling, 60(10), 5172--5187.

Al-Ali, S., Llopis-Lorente, J., Mora, M. T., Seremesant, M., Trenor, B., & Balelli, I. (2023). A causal discovery approach for streamline ion channels selection to improve drug-induced tdp risk assessment.
One_sentence_description: A manually collected dataset that investigates the proarrhythmic risk of 109 drugs using parameters obtained from biophysical models.

title: Causal Dataset for cause-effect pairs from Tübingen repository
One_sentence_description: A two-dimensional database with cause-effect pairs from various datasets, where one variable is known to cause the other.

title: Empathy dataset
license: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International
One_sentence_description: The dataset contains 1973 French-speaking students' questionnaire responses assessing empathy and other components.

title: Isoprenoid gene network in Arabidopsis thaliana
license: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International
Author_references: Arabidopsis thaliana gene expression data set
One_sentence_description: The dataset contains 118 genechip microarray measurements of Arabidopsis thaliana gene expression under various experimental conditions.
